name: The Night Of Old Man Jenkins
name_original: The Night Of Old Man Jenkins
description:
Hello , this is my entry to the Penguin Party / Fire Mustn't go out Kindred Game Jam - I would love to continue making it better, maybe making it into a fully fledged game at some point but for now this is at least playable, even if there is a bug that breaks the game when loading from a save.

I hope you enjoy it

- W to attack

- Q to top up fire

- E to pick up wood

Arrow keys to move

I used no art assets or scripts to control in-game behaviors such as player movement or AI- I did make use of some backend scripts that I made for a previous game that handle the backend of loading and unloading save games - tbh probs wasn't worth it since I ran into a bug near the end of the jam that stopped entities spawning in properly when a save is loaded -  ill probably fix it in the next few days once I figure out exactly what the issue is.
